name: WhileLoops
description:
>C:\users\ausstein\games\WhileLoop : load description.txt

>Nasty while loops always getting your CPU stuck. Can you save it from overheating?

>Accept or decline Variable updates to violate the while loop condition so your computer can snap out of it. 

>Keep an eye on the FanSpeed to prevent fast overheating.

>Hard mode: Get the lowest score possible

>Tip: (Hidden Secret when you manage to skip two loops with one variable update (very hard))

>Ludum Dare game, Theme: Stuck in a Loop

>Fulscreen recommended
